meanings.definition: Make partial or minor changes to (something)
meanings.sent1: I will modify the recipe by adding more salt.
meanings.sent2: She likes to modify her clothes to make them fit better.
meanings.sent3: I tried to modify my hairstyle, but it ended up looking funny.
meanings.sent4: The artist modified the painting with bold brush strokes.
meanings.sent5: He modified his workout routine to include more cardio exercises.

meanings.sent1: Please modify the number of guests allowed at the party.
meanings.sent2: The new rules will modify the way we use the equipment.
meanings.sent3: I had to modify my plans when it started raining unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The strict diet modified her food choices significantly.
meanings.sent5: The teacher modified the assignment deadline to accommodate the students' schedules.
